title: A2UI Client Capabilities Schema
description: A schema for the a2uiClientCapabilities object, which is sent from the client to the server as part of the A2A metadata to describe the client's UI rendering capabilities.

v0.9.description: The capabilities structure for version 0.9 of the A2UI protocol.

supportedCatalogIds.description: The URI of each of the component and function catalogs that is supported by the client.

inlineCatalogs.description: An array of inline catalog definitions, which can contain both components and functions. This should only be provided if the agent declares 'acceptsInlineCatalogs: true' in its capabilities.

name.description: The unique name of the function.

description.description: A human-readable description of what the function does and how to use it.

parameters.description: A JSON Schema describing the expected arguments (args) for this function.

returnType.description: The type of value this function returns.

Catalog.description: A collection of component and function definitions.

components.description: Definitions for UI components supported by this catalog.

functions.description: Definitions for functions supported by this catalog.

theme.title: A2UI Theme
theme.description: A schema that defines a catalog of A2UI theme properties. Each key is a theme property name (e.g. 'primaryColor'), and each value is the JSON schema for that property.
